email.invalid: Email must be a valid email address

password.min: Password must be at least {min} characters
password.max: Password must be at most {max} characters
password.complex: Password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

messages.password-reset-email-sent: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.

success-alert.title: Account Registration Successful
success-alert.message: Your Account has been created. You will receive an email to confirm your email address. Please check your email and click on the link to activate your account.

error-alert.title: Account Registration failed
error-alert.message: There was an error during registration. Please try again.
